User ID and Optional Password

This dialog box appears only if ALL of the following are true:

  • The target path is on a Version Manager file server.

  • The path is associated with an access control database and/or LDAP authentication in the File Server Administration utility.

  • The file server's authentication rejects a user ID of Host_ID and an empty password.

NOTE If a default access control database is being created with the project database, the user ID and password provided here will be added to it.

Field Descriptions

User ID Enter a user ID. By default, this field is populated with the host ID.
Password Enter a password. By default, it is case-sensitive. The characters you enter are displayed as asterisks (*).
